definition: to put up/to build (scaffolding)/to hang (clothes on a pole)/to connect/to join/to arrange in pairs/to match/to add/to throw in (resources)/to take (boat, train)/variant of 褡[da1]

sentences.english: Eric had the luck to have close body contact with his female fans when they were playing games.
sentences.chinese: 孙耀威与女歌迷玩游戏时又搭膊头又揽腰，艳福不浅。

definition: everyday robe worn at home in ancient times/robe worn by priests, monks and scholars
variant of 褡褳|褡裢[da1 lian5]
cloth pouch open in the middle, forming two bags/jacket worn for Chinese wrestling
silk ribbon or braid/lace or embroidery used for hemming
green headband (to visit a Yuan dynasty brothel)/cuckold
fur-lined changpao 長袍|长袍[chang2 pao2]
erhua variant of 坎肩[kan3 jian1]
gauze hat/(fig.) job as an official
